meanings.definition: A sauce typically made of oil, vinegar, and seasonings, used especially on salads.
meanings.sent1: I love drizzling vinaigrettes on my fresh salads.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant offers a variety of vinaigrettes for their salads.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the vinaigrettes for a tiny swimming pool.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a vinaigrettes, adding flavor to the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the vinaigrettes filled the kitchen with a tangy scent.

meanings.definition: A dressing made from oil and vinegar.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious vinaigrettes for the salad.
meanings.sent2: She prefers balsamic vinaigrettes on her vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The cat licked the vinaigrettes off the plate when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a vinaigrettes, mixing sweetness with a hint of bitterness.
meanings.sent5: The vinaigrettes added a zesty kick to the bland dish.
